name: LexLunaSupport
_source: speak;Luna;As good as I can be when I smell like rotting flesh. You?
speak;Lex;I'm doing fine. As long as I have you here, how can I not be?
speak;Luna;Quit getting sappy with me, dumbass.
speak;Lex;Hehe, you know I'm not trying, sister. I just{tgm}...{tgm} worry about you.
speak;Luna;Sometimes. But other times, it's what keeps me going from one day to the next.
speak;Luna;A-anyway, what do you think we should do once we're done here?
speak;Lex;After this? I'm not sure. This seems like a good group, so I wouldn't be opposed to sticking with them a while longer.
speak;Luna;Really? One of them catch your eye?
speak;Lex;N-no! I just{tgm}...{tgm} feel like there's something special here. They don't feel like ordinary mercenaries, you know?
speak;Luna;I think you're crazy. But, as long as they pay, I'll go where you go.
speak;Lex;Maybe. But as long as you're here, I'll stay sane.
speak;Blank;Oh, and watch out for that Mogall behind you.
